original_text: So the soldiers tied up Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego with ropes. They were still wearing their coats, their hats and their other clothes when the soldiers took hold of them. The soldiers threw them into the middle of the hot fire with all their clothes on.
korean_text: 그러자 그 사람들을 겉옷과 속옷과 모자와 다른 옷을 입은 채 결박하여 맹렬히 타는 풀무불 가운데에 던졌더라

sentences.original_text: So the soldiers tied up Shadrach, Meshach and Abednego with ropes.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 군인들이 밧줄로 사드락과 메삭과 아벳네고를 묶었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They were still wearing their coats, their hats and their other clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여전히 자신들의 겉옷과 모자와 다른 옷들을 입고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: when the soldiers took hold of them.
The soldiers threw them into the middle of the hot fire
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들이 그들을 뜨거운 불꽃 한가운데로 던졌습니다
그들이 입고 있는 모든 옷을 입은 채로.
